K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297a-1: a'arya aa da bh'u ha dharma pary'a ya n'a ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-0: 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam @297b grangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-4: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-6: lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs zhig na khang pa brtsegs pa sgo brgyad cu yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-12: dar gyi lnga lnga mang po dbyangs pa zhig mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-15: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-16: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-17: gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la; kha ba tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-18: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:297b-19: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-0: yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de @298a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-1: gnyis las bsod nams shin tu che ba gang yin snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-3: ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-4: bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-5: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-8: zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms kyi zas phyi ma spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-9: chos gos dang; lhung bzed bzhag nas rkang pa bkrus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-10: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bor phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-12: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-14: bdag 'dir snga dri'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-16: lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi slad du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298a-17: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs zhig na khang pa brtsegs pa chab sgo brgyad cu mchis la byug pas byugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-0: dar gyi lnga ldi mang po @298b dbyangs pa dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-2: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-3: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-4: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam bgyis la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-5: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-6: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs bgyis la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel stsal na de gnyis bsod nams shin tu che ba gang lags snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-7: bdag gis yang 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-8: ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-9: bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-10: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung ba rab kyi snyam nas; bcom ldan 'das la bdag don 'di nyid zhu lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la don 'di nyid legs par bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:298b-16: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-2: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-3: mi rnams la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-4: bde ba'i don gyi phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-7: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-9: dzambu gling gi gling ni char dpag tshad bdun stong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-10: rgyar yang dpag tshad bdun stong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-11: byang du ni kha tshon che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-12: lhor ni sog kar 'dug pa de rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-13: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-14: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-15: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-16: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang; dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-18: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la kha ba tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-19: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299a-20: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-0: yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga @299b smra'o; ;kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-3: shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-4: chur ni dpag tshad brgyad stong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-5: rgyar gang dpag tshad brgyad stong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-6: kun nas zla gam lta bar grub pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-9: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-10: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-14: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-15: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-16: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-19: shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-21: nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-22: chur ni dpag tshad dgu stong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:299b-23: zheng yang dpag tshad dgu stong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:300a-0: kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bu grub pa de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa @300a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:300a-19: kun nas gru bzhi lham par grub pa de rigs kyi bu'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:300b-7: shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:300b-13: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:300b-14: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:300b-15: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-0: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod @301a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-1: rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-2: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-5: shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-6: nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-7: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta'ang zhog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-8: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba lta'ang zhog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-11: de rigs kyi bu'am; rigs bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-12: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-13: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-15: dgra bcom pa rnams dang; rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-16: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301a-17: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'dras pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-0: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi @301b gdugs byas nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-4: tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-5: bzod pas dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-6: brtson 'grus kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-7: bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-8: shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-9: byams pas dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-10: snying rjes dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-11: dga' bas dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-12: btang snyoms kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma 'dres pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-17: snying rje chen pos dpag tu med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-20: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-21: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-24: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:301b-27: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-3: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-4: de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-7: 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-020:302a-10: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa //
